name: alice-advice
description: Навык о@#$нный совет для Яндекс Алисы

scripts.publish: npm run archive && npm run yc-function-deploy
scripts.yc-function-deploy: yc serverless function version create --function-name=$npm_package_name --runtime nodejs12 --entrypoint index.handler --memory 128m --execution-timeout 3s --source-path ./package.zip

author: Vladimir Grinenko <i@tadatuta.com>
